meanings.definition: The quality of being feisty or spirited.
meanings.sent1: Her feistinesses shone through when she stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's feistinesses made it a perfect match for the energetic family.
meanings.sent3: Despite her small size, her feistinesses always surprised those who underestimated her.
meanings.sent4: The feistinesses of the roaring lioness could be felt throughout the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The feistinesses of the stormy sea mirrored her fierce determination.

meanings.definition: The state of being full of energy and determination.
meanings.sent1: His feistinesses on the basketball court inspired his teammates to play harder.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner's feistinesses carried her across the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The feistinesses of the squirrel as it chased the acorn was both amusing and impressive.
meanings.sent4: The feistinesses of the engine as it roared to life signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: Her feistinesses in pursuing her dreams was truly admirable.
